title: Forbes ranking of the 10 richest people in Italy 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wealth in billion U.S. dollars for 10 number of Months.
Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has the highest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars and Ennio Doris has the lowest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 21.1 between the maximum Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and minimum Month Ennio Doris.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Wealth in billion U.S. dollars 24.4 is found at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and the minimum is found at Ennio Doris where Month is 3.3.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wealth in billion U.S. dollars for 10 number of Months.
Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has the highest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars and Ennio Doris has the lowest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 21.1 between the maximum Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and minimum Month Ennio Doris.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wealth in billion U.S. dollars for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Wealth in billion U.S. dollars 24.4 is found at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and the minimum is found at Ennio Doris where Month is 3.3.
The second highest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Month Giovanni Ferrero.
There is a difference of 21.1 between the maximum Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and minimum Month Ennio Doris.
Wealth in billion U.S. dollars at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio is 24.4 , second place is Giovanni Ferrero at 21.9, and thirdly is Giorgio Armani at 11.2.
Over the past 10 Months, the Wealth in billion U.S. dollars has reduced.
The Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has 2.43 times more Wealth in billion U.S. dollars than average.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is 100.3 if we add up values of all Months.
